title: disconnected from internt but not?
body:
client keeps telling me im disconnected from the internet yet, as its happening im writing this and on google, youtube etc?
been afk banned because of this which seems really unfair

replies.body: Give the solutions in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Support article a shot, and let us know whether anything works for you!
